title: Can we get champion tokens in One For All?
body: Sort of a newbie question but can we? I got an S last game with Riven and I really got excited, but then I was asking, "Where is the token?"

replies.body:
Nope! You can only earn Championship Mastery Tokens in normal or ranked Summoner's Rift 5v5 matches.

Check out our [Champion Mastery Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for more info on how this system works. Please let me know if you have any questions.
